dict.acceptation: 目击者，见证人；[法]证人；证据；
出席或知道；作记录；提供或作为…的证据；

sent.orig: If your indifference becomes profound in that noticing, you see, you Stand in the Witness-Position already.
sent.trans: 如果你在这考察中对其变成深刻的不关心，你已经站立在观照(Witness)的立场。

sent.orig: The witness was put in the witness box by the counsel.
sent.trans: 证人被律师带上了证人席。

sent.orig: A true witness delivereth a deceitful witness speaketh lies.
sent.trans: 25作真见证的，救人性命；吐出谎言的，施行诡诈。

sent.orig: For many bare false witness against him, but their witness agreed not together.
sent.trans: 56因为有好些人作假见证告他，只是他们的见证，各不相和。

sent.orig: A truthful witness does not deceive, but a false witness pours out lies.
sent.trans: 诚实见证人，不说谎话。假见证人，吐出谎言。
